title: Riven nerf/change
body:
So everyone says riven is broken, even Huni got a Quadra about 15 minutes in at WORLDS the best in all of League of Legends. So what can we do that wont completely gut her(although many would love this idea)?  How about we make her w have higher base damage but have an AP scaling. This way her w would do damage but it wont be as much. Also the stun should be lowered from 0.75s to 0.5s as it is not only aoe but instant cast. 
For Example Only:
Base: 70, 90, 130, 160, 210 + (100% AP)

replies.body: that is why i say put an AP ratio on the W it causes it to not do as much damage but it still does some
Like people have said in other forums just increase her cd would be the easiest or getting her something like mana/rage so she can't spam her skills like she does.

> [{quoted}](name=Eastrid,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=22nlclpv,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-23T01:48:19.391+0000)
>
> Like people have said in other forums just increase her cd would be the easiest or getting her something like mana/rage so she can't spam her skills like she does.

making her CD's too long would force Riot to nerf all the other resource-less champs as she has fairly average cooldowns for resourceless champs. her q is a flat 13 seconds before CDR and after 40% CDR it is 7.8 seconds which is pretty long. they should perhaps make CDR not affect her but giver her something like minus 1s per 100 AD so she does have shorter CD's but not as short as 40% CDR

Q isn't the issue though the main thing is her W and then her E with the CDR. Maxing E with the 100% AD she can take to much dmg and by time you break it in a solo fight she can use W and and do her Q it's an easy rinse and repeat.

What...? Break her... W? Leveling her W? Her E is her shield and is commonly leveled second unless you're snowballing and keeping up the rapetrain. o.o Her E also only lasts for a second and a half. If she E+W's then Q combos you, which is one of the most common combos to be done, her shield is gone by the time the CC is over. lol. You can also easily use knockbacks in a real team fight to beat her. No one played against Riven when Huni used her.

I mixed the keys up but does the same thing can shield dash and Q away. If that doesn't work you W stun dash E and Q jump over a wall. In battle it's Q  dmg W stun basic attack E dash shield Q dmg fast W stun finish Q jump away and R.

Seriously... Look at ROC's team comp when Huni used her... The only one they had that could escape Riven was Caitlynn. OUT OF 5 CHAMPS, ONLY ONE HAD AN ESCAPE. Then they of course only had Gragas and Janna for CC if Varus couldn't land an ult (Which is really easy to dodge as Riven). Huni picked into a team comp that he could very easily win against, especially since his lane opponent was going to be a Rumble.. Plus they ignored Riven the entire game, letting Huni just decimate top, keep a 100 CS lead on his opponent, push in an inner turret 10 minutes in.... Seriously. They played it as if they could ignore Riven all game while she just split pushed and killed the Rumble. Huni had the entire game handed to him on a silver platter. He could have played AP Talon and won at life with how he had jungle and mid help him get free kills non-stop that entire game.

Seriously though. WHO LETS A RIVEN GET AN INNER AT 9 MINUTES?
i just bought riven and jeez i wish i didnt i dont really see whats so fun about this champ i would have much rather saved for ekko dammit

and im lvl 5kindred
Kindred is one of the most fun junglers out there
I see your point but i feel that e should just receive base and scaling nerfs otherwise its fine. Her E is her surviability. for example Katarina has a damage reduction on her e if it's an enemy

also I don't want to absolutely ruin Riven. Just make it so she doesn't do as much. after all 70 damage on mine compared to around 100 base on live is a pretty big difference especially during the early game.
you see olaf? I no longer care about cc.

Riven as a champion may be annoying but then again why don't we just nerf everyone to the ground. Riven is powerful because of her kit having an aoe knock-up and stun. Her AD scallings are also high but her W and E scale off bonus AD. It really is just the cc and execute on her ult that are annoying

lets hope riot just nerfs this bullshit champ into the ground
riven has stayed stupidly op for way too much time
Riven is easy to play but hard to master. The reason she is fun is that once you get good you can outplay others relatively easier than others.
